data.eml:eml: New Cardiodactylus species from unsuspected places in Southeast Asia (Orthoptera, Grylloidea, Eneopterinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Robillard, Tony (2011): New Cardiodactylus species from unsuspected places in Southeast Asia (Orthoptera, Grylloidea, Eneopterinae). Zootaxa 2909: 14-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201455
